resources.string-array:
0.1.0.r163: changed stations/route lists appearance
0.1.1.r164: removed obsolete code
0.1.2.r165: added station selection activity, change log in about
0.1.3.r166: fixed import error on line end
0.1.4.r167: RU localization, station selection changed
0.1.5.r168: swap button moved to menu in create route, some resource improvements
0.1.6.r169: new browse route activity design
0.1.7.r170: favorites draft
0.1.8.r171: fixed UI for routes
0.1.9.r172: rewrited UI for favorite routes
0.1.10.r173: added context menu for favorite routes list
0.1.11.r174: optimized map loading time, pre-styled station info page
0.1.12.r175: added \'Delete\' mode in favorite routes list, changed some icons
0.1.13.r176: finally favorite routes list, rewrited map and import menus, fixed routing errors
0.1.14.r177: a lot of minor fixes
0.1.15.r178: background design changes, reversed favorite routes list
0.1.16.r179: bug fixed: open station info failed when no station selected or file not exists
0.1.17.r180: fix route drop after map locale changing
0.1.18.r181: experimental backgound-thread rendering
0.1.19.r182: experimental rendering optimizations
0.1.20.r184: added settings for disable anti-aliasing
0.1.21.r185: experimental GPS/GSM location search
0.1.22.r186: GPS/GSM location search worked
0.1.23.r187: added native library
0.1.24.r188: added search coordinates activity
0.1.25.r190: rewrited drawing of stations names
0.2.1.r198: global model refactoring: multiple maps support, languages, GPS coordinates,layers
0.2.1.r199: delayed scheme loading
0.2.1.r200: delayed locales\' texts loading
0.2.1.r201: bug fixing1
0.2.1.r206: rewrited grayed objects rendering - using color recalculation instead alfa-channel
0.2.1.r207: render entire map cache if it isn\'t exceed VM memory limits
0.2.1.r208: fixed anti-aliasing bug on change zoom level while scrolling
0.2.1.r210: rewrited import list
0.2.1.r211: import list bugs fixing
0.2.1.r212: added infrastructure for GPS location injection into model, added coordinates for stations in Moscow city via moscow.gps asset
0.2.1.r213: locate nearest station
0.2.1.r214: fixed short-click handler
0.2.1.r216: using B-tree clipping
0.2.1.r218: repaired route searching
0.2.1.r219: fixed some route issues
0.2.2.r220: transport selection for route, maps became incompatible with previous version
0.2.2.r221: fixed bug with single transport maps
0.2.2.r222: fixed transport types localizations
0.2.3.r223: fixed scheme changing force-close while route is selected, maps became incompatible with previous version
0.2.3.r224: changed icon and logo
0.2.3.r225: fixed FC without manual language set
0.2.3.r226: fixed FC on import cleanup mode change with ru_RU locale
0.2.3.r227: added classes for map repository infrastructure, added GPL header to some files
0.2.3.r228: added online/local storage for map catalogs
0.2.4.r229: fixed station names rendering, added transport types into model, maps became incompatible with previous version
0.2.4.r234: font sizes changed to scaled pixels
0.2.4.r235: compare maps between two catalogs
0.2.4.r236: added transport icons on experimental map list
0.2.4.r240: first draft of new map view with tabs
0.2.4.r241: replace map library with new tabbed view, rewrited settings
0.2.4.r243: progress bars added into map catalog views
0.2.4.r244: refactored maps activities code, fixed import statuses
0.2.4.r245: fixed local/favorites statuses
0.2.4.r246: activities refactored
0.2.4.r247: online catalog states fixed
0.2.4.r249: online catalog moved to dropbox
0.2.4.r250: refactored catalog adapter classes
0.2.4.r251: added fake details page for map and catalog context menu
0.2.4.r252: preview of map details activity
0.2.4.r258: refactored data persistence classes
0.2.4.r259: online catalog loading progress
0.2.4.r262: preview of import/online operations from map details activity
0.2.4.r272: fixed local/online/import catalogs update events
0.2.4.r274: delete, import, download, update options in map context menu
0.2.4.r276: added search operation in maps catalogs
0.2.4.r279: payment systems integration for donate
0.2.4.r285: catalog statuses changed, show Importing/Downloading (Pending) status everywere
0.2.4.r287: changed catalog item layout, added country icons (need to download icon pack in /sdcard/ametro/icons)
0.2.5.r290: added description to map detail view, maps became incompatible with previous version
0.2.5.r299: plain list view for local maps catalog
0.2.5.r302: migrate from independent task to to sync/async catalog task queue architecture
0.2.5.r304: all catalog operations migrated to task queue
0.2.5.r308: activity for selecting maps for download/import (pre-alpha version)
0.2.5.r310: country icons download confirmation dialog
0.2.5.r317: map catalogs UI tuning
0.2.6.r321: added maps transport types dictionaries, maps became incompatible with previous version
0.2.6.r322: map schemes selection dialog
0.2.6.r324: bug fixes
0.2.6.r326: added delete maps operation in local catalog
0.2.6.r327: added preview of line delays for routing
0.2.7.r332: multiple catalogs sources support, fixed station aliases, changed map timestamp detection, maps became incompatible with previous version
0.2.7.r334: tasks notifications added
0.2.7.r342: new location search dialog, GPL confirmation, maps autoupdate
0.2.7.r349: delayed online catalog loading
0.3.0: release candidate 1
0.3.1: fixed station search in map activity, location search dialog
0.3.2: fixed corrupted/unsupported map import/download issue
0.3.3: fixed map reloading after refresh
0.3.4: fixed status colors
0.3.5: local catalog default action while status is calculating
0.3.6: remove under construction stations from route station lists and autocomplete
0.3.7: added first line delay (time of day) in route calculation, fixed delays loading for SPB
0.3.8: fixed invalid rendering object sort algorithm
0.3.9: added file timestamp check for import catalog
0.3.10: notify user about map update while map activity on top
